Author: rzioma
Content:
@mole99 what is more advisable & future proof when **defining the mapping between the core signals and pads on a padring**?
 Imagine I have 16-bit address bus of the retro chip and I want to assign them to a particular physical pads, should I better 
a) change the binding order in `config.yaml` modifying `PAD_SOUTH`,`PAD_EAST` ...
NOT changing power pad locations! Those stay always the same as in the template.

Author: rzioma
Content:
or
b) only change how it is defined in Verilog file, say in `chip_core.sv`, but never touch `config.yaml` PADs
